website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-learn system that delivers reliable, basic service.
pros: Hides itself from some radar detector detectors

customer_reviews.title: Unable to connect to Bluetooth after update.
customer_reviews.text: Device works good at first and connected it to Bluetooth and and iRadar App and it connected. Updated the software on the device and it updated successfully and now will not connect to Bluetooth on iPhone 11 Pro Max. Tried to update again using another computer and still not connecting to Bluetooth or the iRadar App. Deleted the App and reinstalled the app and not connecting to Bluetooth and also reset the network set on iPhone and same results.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Was great and now not so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit last November and it was great. Few months down the road and the tab on the suction cup broke. I tried reaching Cobra but due to COVID they state on their website "No refunds and no exchanges"! False alarms are getting more frequent and the sound for the alarms are getting tinny/ crackly as if the speaker is starting to break. I can live with that problem, but how can I use the device without it being mounted on the windshield?! Customer support is Horrible. Good thing I made the purchase using a credit card that protects me in those situations.
customer_reviews.author: mohamed bassiouny

customer_reviews.title: Needs work still.
customer_reviews.text: Detector kept falsing to a rear alert. It would lock on to that alert and stay alerting to it till i unplugged and re plugged it in. I can't recommend this detectors based off what i experienced.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: The appis junk, and is required for most features. I was unable to connect it to a galaxy s8 or s9 via bluetooth. No user database, no speed limts , etc. And customer support from cobra was no help at all. Radar detector works fairly well across all bands except laser. I've never been able to detect a laser radar gun with it. Display is nice. Cant recommend since half of the features do not work.
customer_reviews.author: Jinks42

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and quality
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews, but this product is Amazing!!! value and quality, seems well made. It also looks cool. detects radars from far away; Very accurate, I’m saving tons on tickets, best purchase ever
customer_reviews.author: OmarAhcar

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic radar detector
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic radar! Considering all the other alternatives with arrows cost hundreds of dollars more! It has a very handy button on the cigarette lighter plug along with and additional usb outlet. You can easily mute and mark to block false signals. Went on a long road trip and it saved me a few times! Had an older Cobra before and it was constantly going off. This one has the gps built in and can easily mark false signals and quiet them automatically. Love it and will definitely be looking for a future upgraded model!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Faulty.
customer_reviews.text: Did not really register radar. And I mean real radars not just cops. It would give false reads, no reads, and late reads. Was not satisfied with the device.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Robles

customer_reviews.title: Its great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great radar detector! Very accurate and not like other radars that are constantly beeping. Installation was easy. I updated the software and it filters out other signals and makes it 100% accurate. Software update was very user friendly and took 5 mins. This one by far is the best value regarding quality and accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Bove

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up. Works perfect and does what is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepguy

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best radar detector that I ever had!! I have not received any false alerts yet and it's so advanced!!
customer_reviews.author: mike gregory

customer_reviews.title: Good value if they fix the problems
customer_reviews.text: I bought this detector and it constantly falsed to 33.6 on the rear antenna indicating a broken antenna. Also had issues connecting to phone. Arrows worked nicely. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I turned it on and two miles later I seen two cops sitting on the side of the road and on my $350 ticket, it says they got me on radar. And this thing never warned me, and I had it set on highway (i-80) and nothing happened and no alarm. Very upset
customer_reviews.author: Classy Dude

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Works well. No radar detectors is perfect. Do like the GPS guided lock outs however every now and then I have to unlock a signal coming from a cop.Laser detection is not the best, but this is a problem inherent to all mounted radar detectors. Works For its desired purpose is an integral part of my multi prong approach, which is waze, radar detector, and being vigilant. Directional alerts is a huge Pro
customer_reviews.author: Asper Knolls

customer_reviews.title: Avoid The Fine and Points. True All Around 360 Degree Protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb radar detector that picks up all of the law enfoecement radar signals giving you the ability to slow down before being identified and fined. You can also cut any unnecessary auto insurance expenses due to points being added to your license. The unit has true 360 degree detection, and picks up the signal before any meaningful data is available to the patrol; allowing you to slow down and avoid trouble. The unit is user friendly and fits in your vehicle easily. I give this unit 5 stars; and it can pay for itself with one detection.
customer_reviews.author: WIZARD D

customer_reviews.title: Very Efficient
customer_reviews.text: This radar detector is very efficient! Driving down the local expressway it notifies me about a mile or more before I even see the police car. This detector also will pick up the occasional sliding doors, and radar signs too. Which is annoying but really I only use it on the expressway anyway so it works great! I love that there’s a feature where you can set a speed to have it notify you if you are going too fast. This is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User 113

customer_reviews.title: Excellent detection device
customer_reviews.text: Most accurate detector I’ve owned and the direction arrow makes it worth its weight in gold
customer_reviews.author: Troy D.

customer_reviews.title: Best radar detector money can buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had many radar detectors including the escort Max 360 and the Uniden R3 along with Beltronics, Whistler and Valentine. In my opinion this is the best radar detector for the money and they can hang in there with the big boys as it has great range on all bands and minimum falseing
customer_reviews.author: Mark Thain

customer_reviews.title: Now with MRCD detection.
customer_reviews.text: As of a week ago, the new v1.2 firmware adds MRCD detection capabilities. Update with Detector Tools Pro.
customer_reviews.author: N.S.

product_meta.title: Cobra DualPro 360° Radar Detector by Creators of Escort Radar - Long Range, iRadar App, Front & Rear Advanced Sensors, Directional Alert Arrows, GPS AutoLearn Technology for Fewer False Alerts
product_meta.description: Introducing the 360, Cobra’s Elite, front-line radar detector. With Dual Antennas for “true 360” directional arrows, advanced digital signal processing and exclusive software for impressive range, precision, and ultra-fast processing. Optimized to deliver the three most demanded radar detector features, at the highest level: extra-long range, pinpoint accuracy and true 360 detection, the 360 is designed to do just that.
feature_bullets: FRONT AND REAR SENSORS - With 360° directional alert arrows - Lightning fast detection w/ DSP technology to find threats fast and accurately. Front and rear antennas scan completely around you; you’ll pinpoint the signal to stay ahead of the threat

ELIMINATE FALSE ALERTS – Receive fewer false alerts And make informed decisions quickly w/ customizable high-resolution multi-color graphic display. Gaps based auto learn provides 5 levels of filters, so you only see/hear real threats on the road.

BE CONNECTED - Connect to radar for upcoming threat alerts, police locations and red-light cameras - iRadar App and cloud connectivity provide enhanced crowd sourced alerts and connects via Bluetooth with optional Defender database subscription.

SIMPLE COMMUNICATION - Keep operation of your radar detector simple and effortless. Directional arrows locate the threat, the high resolution display shows you threat type and voice alerts in dual languages make for an effective hands-free drive.
SECURE ATTACHMENT - With EZ Mag Windshield Mount and includes Smartcord USB Charging Port - Everything you need and more in a convenient travel bag.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars46 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Includes SmartCord with built-in alert light and mute button, the revolutionary EZ Mag Windshield Mount and a handy travel case
